explanation: "Saturday on the 1st weekend should return true if discountWeekend = 1"
"Saturday on the 5th weekend of December 2023 should return false if discountWeekend = 4"
"Sunday on the last day of February 2032 (a leap year) should return true if discountWeekend = 4."
"First day of September 2024 (Sunday) should return false if discountWeekend = 1 (not considered part of 1st weekend)."
"First Monday of January 2023 should return false (no discount during weekdays)."
"First Tuesday of January 2023 should return false (no discount during weekdays)."
"First Wednesday of January 2023 should return false (no discount during weekdays)."
"First Thursday of January 2023 should return false (no discount during weekdays)."
"First Friday of January 2023 should return false (no discount during weekdays)."
